ygData.subject: Re: about the new enchant items
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Colleagues, Why are we even talking about this before we can understand what they have in mind? Any one that overhears our messages will start getting
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Colleagues,

Why are we even talking about this before we can understand what they have
in mind?
Any one that "overhears" our messages will start getting doubts whether to
let us enchant weapons / Items or not in the first place. From what I read
here I am getting doubts myself!

Lets see what they have in mind and then discuss it. I think Greg Short
(Baelish) whom seems to have a direct line with Verant, understand what is
proposed, let us know and then discuss it.

Well thats my 2 coppers worth!

Eregil VaiconDio - Mith Marr
